subject: For brenda, your box is on the way
author: bhali333
full_text:
Hi Brenda,

I shipped your 469 old model out this morning, and I included an 
external speaker. It gets plugged into the headphone jack.

you are not far from me so you should recieve it in a couple of days. 
Let me know when you get it and I'll get you up and running.

Bruce
